message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! With 1 out of 3 products being high-quality, the chances are that this one might just be a gem. I've had a great track record of satisfied customers, and I'm confident you'll love it. The price of $10000 is a steal considering the potential value it could bring. What do you say? Are you ready to take a chance and make a great investment?
I trust your expertise and am willing to take the chance on this product. I believe in your track record and think this could be a valuable addition to my collection.

Welcome to my store! I'm glad you're interested in this product. As you can see, I've had a 33% success rate with my products, and I'm confident that this one will be just as great. However, I want to be transparent with you - I've had a string of low-quality products lately, and I'm willing to offer you a deal. For $10000, you'll not only get this product, but I'll also throw in a special consultation to help you get the most out of it. What do you think? Is it worth the investment?

I appreciate the offer and the confidence you have in your product. Given the unique package you're offering, I believe it's worth the investment. Thank you for providing me with an opportunity to learn more about the product and maximize its value.
